Package io.micronaut.tracing.brave

Class BraveTracerConfiguration

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.tracing.brave.BraveTracerConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.micronaut.core.util.Toggleable
@Requires(classes=brave.Tracing.class) @Requires(property="tracing.zipkin.enabled",value="true") @ConfigurationProperties("tracing.zipkin") public class BraveTracerConfiguration extends Object implements io.micronaut.core.util.Toggleable
Configuration properties for Brave.
Since:
1.0
Author:
graemerocher
